posts.message:
[align=center][img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/411/hfusernews.png[/img][/align]

Updated: Added interview with T3h Hack3r

[align=center][img]http://goo.gl/9wMJo[/img][/align]

[url=http://goo.gl/q9Qcg][color=#00BFFF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has repfucked himself and removed access to his reputation page from his profile. However, you can still access it by going [url=http://hackforums.net/reputation.php?uid=1]here[/url].

Our beloved [url=http://goo.gl/HETYy][color=#0066FF][b]-mothered-[/b][/color][/url] has returned to us, there is still skepticism about it actually being him as his name was changed to Premium(tm) and he is posting in many places he usually wouldn't.
-He was recently banned for stolen account.

A loyal Reviewer and member who has been banned for the last two months has finally returned, [url=http://goo.gl/OxtbC][color=#0066FF][b]Vanadium[/b][/color][/url] had been banned due to a bug in the system.

[url=http://goo.gl/TFS71][color=white][b]Nyx-[/b][/color][/url]'s reputation has become a battleground, with over fifty-four negatives in just the past week. He is also the user with the second highest negative reputation.

[color=#0066FF][b]Thirty-two[/b][/color] people have joined the deep blue sea as Ub3rs since the last edition.

There has been well over a hundred bans due to the new "Not in Marketplace" rule.

[align=center][img]http://goo.gl/6bjLl[/img][/align]

[color=#FFFFE0][size=large][b]General Thread(s)[/b][/size][/color]
[i][b]Heart-Warming Thread[/b][/i] - [url=http://goo.gl/45t0S]My thoughts on love, a love story, and some questions.[/url] - [url=http://goo.gl/uqFpZ][color=#0066FF][b]Arruke[/b][/color][/url] - While this thread isn't exactly heart-warming, it really is a good and interesting read. 
[i][b]Most Musical Thread[/b][/i] - [url=http://goo.gl/T2aWk]Hackforum's Ultimate Playlist[/url] - [url=http://goo.gl/TxoJ4][color=#0066FF][b]alabama[/b][/color][/url] - This thread did receive a sticky as it appeals to many tastes and musical preferences.
[i][b]Funniest Troll[/b][/i] - [url=http://goo.gl/mSz4L]I need some adviceeee[/url] - [url=http://goo.gl/gkIya][color=white][b]Frida[/b][/color][/url] - Once again, it must be said, Frida is one of the best trolls on Hack Forums. Anyone who is in need of a laugh just needs to follow what he posts.

[color=#FFFFE0][size=large][b]SRPP Thread(s)[/b][/size][/color]
[i][b]Most Replied Debate[/b][/i] - [url=http://goo.gl/9pp02]Hey Arabs Lets Become Friends With Israel ![/url] - [url=http://goo.gl/UsWHS][color=white][b]c00ldodo[/b][/color][/url] - There really isn't a lot of substance to the original post, but it has been receiving vast amounts of conversation.
[i][b]Most Controversial Topic[/b][/i] - [url=http://goo.gl/DvjIM]My philosophical opinion on why abortion is not wrong or murder[/url] - [url=http://goo.gl/mHvMR][color=#0066FF][b]RobotzInDisguise[/b][/color][/url] - Abortion is a common topic nowadays, people debating what they think is right versus wrong. This thread provides a great environment to discuss your opinion.

[color=#FFFFE0][size=large][b]Members Contest Thread(s)[/b][/size][/color]
[i][b]Most Generous Threads[/b][/i] - [url=http://goo.gl/c5A3t]Threads List[/url]  - [url=http://goo.gl/k0mHC][color=#0066FF][b]hughappy[/b][/color][/url] -  There have been many giveaways and contests made by this user. 

[color=#FFFFE0][size=large][b]Suggestion Thread(s)[/b][/size][/color]
[b][i]Thoughtful Suggestion[/i][/b] - [url=http://goo.gl/A9m9U]Moderator For The "HF Gamers Zone"[/url] - [url=http://goo.gl/UfiWP][color=#0066FF][b]Spafic[/b][/color][/url] - It is fairly obvious that there needs to be moderation of these sections, as there is constant spam and low quality posting.

[align=center][img]http://goo.gl/XlrXu[/img][/align]

[color=deepskyblue][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview - T3h Hack3r[/font][/size][/color][spoiler=]
[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] Hello T3h Hacker, are there anyone you'd like to give a shout to?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] Yes. I'd like to give a shout out to Factor8â„¢, Paradoxum, Tha Sneak, Infallible. And anyone else who I may have missed.

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] When you joined hackforums did you have any friends and do you currently have any reliable trustworthy friends on hackforums?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] Not at the time. My first mate would have been Dcrac23 from memory as he purchased myself an Upgrade from being a normal member to Ub3r, I'm still quite thankful till this date for that even though he isn't active. Yes at the moment I've got a numerous amount of friends on hackforums added on msn messenger which I speak to on a day to day basis.

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] How did you find hackforums?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] I was searching for some runescape related hacking tools I believe a few months prior to deciding to register. I did an ideal amount of lurking after deciding to register, from memory I had around three weeks of overall online with around fifty posts.

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] How did you think of your username (T3h Hack3r)?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] I still can't recall how I came across it till this date. I've gone as the name T3h on various gaming forums which some members here may recognise myself by. I wished to change my username around a week back to TH although username had to be above three characters.

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] Are you a black hat, white hat, or a gray hat hacker? Or are you not a hacker at all?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] I'd describe myself as a grey hat hacker, being associated with the Hijackthis team I'm not allowed to associate myself with disallowed blackhat activity. Although I do install various forms or malware on my virtual machine from time to time for testing purposes. Most people these days don't understand that malware can be used for testing purposes.

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] Are there any specific reasons why you were made staff and what was your expression when you were invited to be staff?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] Not that I'm aware of, I followed site policies and also assisted newcomers to the forum prior to being Invited. In regards to my expression I was quite suprised. I recall coming home from school and spamming Factor8's msn saying that I received an Invite. 

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] Do you think you've helped hackforums since you've become staff?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] I would say so. Being associated with the Hijackthis team I answered around twenty logs per day assisting members within our community with appropriate removal instructions. Due to being Invited as Staff I haven't been as active as I used to be, although I still teach trainees and assist members from time to time.

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] Do you see your self as HQ?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] No I don't. ðŸ˜

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] I see you're in the HJT Team do you help alot of members with their computer problems?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] Yes till this date I've aided around six-hundred to seven-hundred members in total. I also teach trainees through some of the Easy and Advance Practice logs which are required to become a Qualified Hijackthis member.

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] Is there anyone specific you'd like to say "Good Job" to?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] Infallible. For currently taking the HJT workload. 

[b][color=#0066FF]Reported[/color]:[/b] Alright now time to wrap this interview up, is there a tip you'd like to give to everyone on hackforums?
[b][color=lime]T3h Hack3r[/color]:[/b] Read the help documents.
[/spoiler]

[color=deepskyblue][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Jokeview - BV1 - We needed an interview, and I received this >_< - More of a joke[/font][/size][/color][spoiler=]
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 Hello BV1
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 Hey
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 Thanks for participating in the HF News interview for September 28th.
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 No problem.
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 Would you like to give any shoutouts?
[size=xx-small](5 min later)[/size]
 Ok then, let's move on
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 Haha sorry, was closing stuff down.
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 What are your most recent accomplishments?
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 Had like 80 tabs open.
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 That's a mighty accomplishment.
 How'd you conquer that one?
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 haha
 Well accomplishments... avoiding any major downtime from the cops hitting bshades.com was nice.
 Moved over to a nice, seemingly BP, domain
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 How is the business going?
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 Very good actually, we were actually thinking about throwing a sale after the downtime.
 Giving out some free copies, a lot of discounts, etc.
 Also looking into expanding a bit
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 Would I be able to join the Blackshades team?
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 If you're interested and willing to fill out an app, I'd be willing to give you a shot, if you meet the requirements.
 Over 16 years old, Own 2+ bshades products, preferably in the US timezone right now, we need people during that time.

[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
Ok, I filled out an application
 [quote][color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Minecraft IGN:[/size][/font][/color]alabamaHF
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Reason you want to join:[/size][/font][/color]I think I could help greatly with the Blackshades Support.
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Do you agree to participate in absolutely all projects or post if you cannot:[/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Please link us to some of your Minecraft contributions:[/size][/font][/color]
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Will you play our server actively:[/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Post activity is required. Can you agree to post a non LQ post every day unless you are not on HF that day?:[/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Will you actually read the group stickies: [/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Do you agree to never grief or cause any drama and to use /m if you have an issue with someone:[/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Will you contribute to the best of your ability:[/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Will you apply for all of our group projects or post on the thread telling us why you cannot:[/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]One last time, are you truly going to dedicate yourself to the group the best you can:[/size][/font][/color]Yes
[color=#5dc43c][font=Monotype Corsiva][size=large]Creepers go:[/size][/font][/color]Thanks for reading my application.[/quote]

[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 :|
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 Is that sufficient?
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1678116
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]

[quote][b]Name[/b] alabama
[b]Age[/b] 16
[b]Timezone/Country[/b] 7
[b]Grammar on a Scale 1-10[/b]10
[b]Coding Languages you Excel In[/b]B++, Garden snake
[b]Coding Languages you have Basic Knowledge in[/b]Visual Standard
[b]Blackshades Products Owned[/b]Aviators, snap back
[b]Why you should be Picked[/b]To help with the Blackshades, and I am india[/quote]

[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 7 meaning gmt -7 or gmt +7?
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 -7
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
  :|
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
  Is there a problem with application?
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
  :)
 Intel or AMD?
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 Intel
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 Why is your seasoning for that?
[b][color=#E0FFFF]BV1 says:[/color][/b]
 Generally better
[b][color=#FFFFE0]alabama says:[/color][/b]
 Ah, I prefer margerine
 The chicken or pepsi?

[b][color=#E0FFFF] BV1 has left the conversation.[/b][/color]
[/spoiler]
